title: The Huddle Room celebrates creative growth through first ever ‘CreaCon’
description: CreaCon reiterated the agency’s passion to help raise the industry’s bar when it comes to being creative

title: Bantag, others face murder complaints for deaths of Percy Lapid and middleman
description: Bantag, another BuCor official, and several other prisoners are also facing a separate complaint for the death of alleged middleman Jun Villamor

title: Miss Universe PH opens applications for 2023 pageant
description: Aspiring candidates, regardless of their civil status, can apply until January 29, 2023

title: Premiere Horizon outlines growth trajectory after SquidPay
description: Premiere Horizon Alliance Corporation (PHA) has withdrawn its fold-in plans of SquidPay Technology Inc. (SPTI), citing self-proclaimed technopreneur Marvin Dela Cruz’s inability to operate a viable business and his being embroiled in recent financial troubles.

title: Alleged motorcycle thief slain in ‘shootout’ with Nueva Ecija cops
description: A man who allegedly stole a motorcycle was killed during shootout with police in San Isidro, Nueva Ecija Nov. 6, authorities said.
